scripts.build:
printf "\033[41;97mLibplanet note: currently, it is expected for `yarn build` to fail on the first run and succeed on the second run due to an unknown issue unrelated to the codebase (see issue #3492,) so the build phase runs twice. Whenever the culprit is specified please remove this message and the duplicate call.\033[0m
" >&2 && _libplanet_build=1 yarn workspaces foreach -p -A run build || _libplanet_build=1 yarn workspaces foreach -p -A run build
scripts.postinstall: env | grep -E '^_libplanet_build=1$' || yarn build && echo ran yarn build
scripts.prepack:
printf "\033[41;97mLibplanet note: `yarn pack` is not allowed on the project root level, as it produces useless empty package. use `yarn pack-all` instead.\033[0m
" > /dev/stderr && false
